Claim: "A girl with curly hair is drinking juice."
Implication: "A girl with curly hair is taking a big bite from a hamburger."
Referring expressions: Girl, curly hair, juice  Girl, curly hair, hamburger
Formula: (exists a (IsCurlyHaired(a) and IsDrinkingJuice(a))) -> (exists a (IsTakingABigBite(a) and IsCurlyHaired(a)))
